 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָקַם‎</span>] **verb** ==variegate== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְקָם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִקְמָתָא‎</span> ***variegated cloth*** or ***skin***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***freckles***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹקֵם‎</span>, as substantive ***variegator***, worker (weaver) in colours, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> mater. [[Exod.38.23|Exod 38:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֶאכֶת חָרָשׁ וְחשֵׁב וְר‎</span> [[Exod.35.35|Exod 35:35]] especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲשֵׂה ר‎</span> ***variegator's work*** [[Exod.26.69|Exod 26:69]]; [[Exod.27.16|Exod 27:16]]; [[Exod.28.39|Exod 28:39]] = [[Exod.36.37|Exod 36:37]]; [[Exod.38.18|Exod 38:18]]; [[Exod.39.29|Exod 39:29]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]; all with mater. except [[Exod.28.39|Exod 28:39]]). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻקַּמְתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.139.15|Ps 139:15]] ***I was skilfully wrought*** (woven, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סכד‎</span> v[[Ps.139.13|Ps 139:13]]).
